3: The intense explosion shakes the carriage.
Inside the noble carriage.
Jamilah has already made a decision.
Sophia, I'm counting on you.
Understood.
...Leader, I recall advising you to be careful with your actions... in front of others, at least.
Wait, what about me?
If that big fellow did something, then it's best to increase our battle power.
You cannot follow them, we can't afford any spontaneous actions at the moment.
We cannot upset the aristocrats now.
Tsk...!
So you want me to go 'protect' those so-called better humans?
At least nominally, you'll need to play the part.
I fear that slippery old fox would take action if two of our precious battle power resources are deployed.
...Understood.
On the other side.
Please evacuate to the rear carriages through here.
Everyone, this way. Staying in the front carriages is dangerous, please evacuate to the back immediately.
Heads up, the Corrupted are invading!
Such a stubborn bunch...!
Engage and destroy.
